> Malice:
>  
> As soon as Myrmidon's back was turned to him, Malice lunged in.  He
> dropped the chain sword along the way and caught the blade in the 
> left side of his chest.  It would stop at his harder internal 
> skeleton, abut it put him in very close proximity to his opponent.  
> With powerful claws he sprang in to grab and tear at Myrmidon.
>
> Perceptor opened fire agains Malice, as the internal defences.

Myrmidon held onto his great curved blade as it penetrated malice's
armor and hitched in his internal structure. As Malice moved forward
Myrmidon did the most expedient thing and simply lifted Malice by the
end of the very blade he was hung on as he flexed his arms outward to
keep him at bay. With a heave he attempted to send him flying into
Perceptor's weapons fire!

(OOC: What kind of weapons is the internal base defenses firing?)

Preston
(Myrmidon)
